doc.after: During 2005 2006 Bristol Water started restoring two artificial islands These are intended to provide safe nesting and roosting sites for a range of wildfowl Permits to enter the reservoir enclosure and to use the access roads paths and bird hides are available for a fee only to members of ornithological and naturalist societies recognised by Bristol Water They can be obtained from Woodford Lodge and include conditions of use imposed by the owners 22
